data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The language the Romans spoke and wrote was known as Latin. The ____ of ____ Latin ____ in ____ modern ____ is ____. Mainly ____ of ____ territorial ____ of ____ Roman Empire, ____ Latin ____ as ____ as ____ and ____ spread ____ the ____ of ____ Europe. Although not all Western European languages are "Romantic" or Latin-based (Italian, French, Spanish, Portuguese), even modern Germanic languages (German, English, Dutch, Danish, Swedish, Norwegian) use the Latin alphabet.
data.partBlankContent: The language the Romans spoke and wrote was known as Latin. The impor_____ of t__ Latin lang____ in t__ modern wo___ is imm____. Mainly bec____ of t__ territorial si__ of t__ Roman Empire, t__ Latin alph____ as we__ as vocab_____ and gra____ spread throu_____ the enti____ of Wes____ Europe. Although not all Western European languages are "Romantic" or Latin-based (Italian, French, Spanish, Portuguese), even modern Germanic languages (German, English, Dutch, Danish, Swedish, Norwegian) use the Latin alphabet.
data.fullContent: The language the Romans spoke and wrote was known as Latin. The importance of the Latin language in the modern world is immense. Mainly because of the territorial size of the Roman Empire, the Latin alphabet as well as vocabulary and grammar spread throughout the entirety of Western Europe. Although not all Western European languages are "Romantic" or Latin-based (Italian, French, Spanish, Portuguese), even modern Germanic languages (German, English, Dutch, Danish, Swedish, Norwegian) use the Latin alphabet.
data.answer: 罗马人说的和写的语言被称为拉丁语。拉丁语在现代世界的重要性是巨大的。主要是由于罗马帝国的领土面积，拉丁字母以及词汇和语法遍布整个西欧。虽然不是所有的西欧语言都是“浪漫”的或以拉丁为基础的(意大利语、法语、西班牙语、葡萄牙语)，甚至现代日耳曼语(德语、英语、荷兰语、丹麦语、瑞典语、挪威语)也使用拉丁字母。
